hey we have searched for the Process to Get Aadhaar Physical Copy Delivered to Your Home

You can order a PVC Aadhaar card online, and it will be delivered to your registered address via Speed Post.

1. Visit the official UIDAI website:
Link: https://uidai.gov.in/

2. Change language to English (if needed):
- On the top right, select ‚ÄúEnglish‚Äù for easy navigation.

3. Go to ‚ÄúOrder Aadhaar PVC Card‚Äù:
- Scroll down to the ‚ÄúGet Aadhaar‚Äù section.

- Click on ‚ÄúOrder Aadhaar PVC Card.‚Äù

4. Enter your Aadhaar details:
- Enter your Aadhaar number (or Virtual ID/Enrollment ID).

- Enter the captcha shown on the screen.

5. Verify with OTP:
- Click on ‚ÄúSend OTP.‚Äù

- Enter the OTP sent to your registered mobile number.

6. Make Payment:
- The fee for ordering the PVC Aadhaar card is ‚Çπ50 (including Speed Post charges).

- Pay securely using the available online payment options.

7. Track Your Delivery:
- After payment, you will receive a Service Request Number (SRN).

- You can use this SRN to track your Aadhaar PVC card delivery status on the UIDAI website.

‚úÖ The PVC Aadhaar card will be delivered to your registered address within 5‚Äì15 days via Speed Post.

‚úÖ This card is valid for all official purposes and is convenient for carrying in your wallet.


Note: You can send your Aadhar details and we can help you out with the process.
